title: Luminary Levels
copy: Luminary membership is open to all who support the museum with an annual unrestricted gift of $3,000 or more.   LEVELS We invite you to take part in moments of connection, reflection, and learning with our singular and wide-ranging collections with elevated concierge services. From personalized tours led by our world-class curators to exclusive conservation access and museum-wide programs, there is always something new—and extraordinary—for Luminary members.   Already a Luminary? Renew online . Interested in more information about Luminary? We’d be delighted to hear from you; please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu .
